data.message: Fix MCP token bypass vulnerability: Added autonomy gate to duro_delete_artifact in duro_mcp_server.py:4252-4280. Precheck + token consumption before delete. Commit 99c83d4. 30 lines added. Requires server restart.
data.outcome: Added autonomy gate to duro_delete_artifact in duro_mcp_server.py:4252-4280. Precheck + token consumption before delete. Commit 99c83d4. 30 lines added. Requires server restart.
